metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14586 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Use after free vulnerability in EDK II may allow an authenticated user topotentially enable escalation of privilege, information disclosure and/ordenial of service via adjacent access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14586` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.1
qemu-efi - 0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.1').
